column1: donald a. davis| princeton - donald a. davis
column3: of princeton went to be with his lord and savior on wednesday
column5: 2015 at angels touch in princeton. born october 26
column6: 1937 at algoma he was the son of the late calvin davis and nellie holcomb davis allaire. donald attended princeton church of god. he was a former employee of niesner brothers stores in new york and obrians retail in princeton. for many years he was a manager and district manager for hills department stores and later was a manager for walmart
column7: retiring in 1997. he was an awesome cook and loved to have cookouts for family and friends. donald was an avid sports fan
column8: especially of wvu football. in addition to his parents he was preceded in death by two brothers
column9: claude davis and tommy davis. survivors include his wife of 39 years
column10: kay mc. pherson davis; three children
column12: dee anna miller of princeton and donnie davis and wife jessica of lewisburg; two grandchildren
column13: christian davis of lewisburg and kiana miller of naomi; two nieces
column14: debbie allen and husband david of bluefield
column15: va and their son corey allen and wife krista of princeton and susan dick of charleston and her children
column17: erin foster and husband kevin of wayside and jennifer kincaid and husband shawn of oak hill; one nephew joe kidwell and wife nancy of panama city
column19: ken and teresa collis of princeton. funeral services will be conducted at 1:00 pm. saturday
column21: 2015 at the rowland h. bailey funeral chapel of the bailey-kirk funeral home in princeton with rev. fred farley officiating. entombment will follow at roselawn memorial gardens in princeton. family will serve as pallbearers. friends may visit with the family on saturday
column22: june 13 from 12:00 p. m. until the service hour at bailey-kirk funeral home. arrangements by bailey-kirk funeral home in princeton. to view a video tribute to mr. davis or send the family online condolences please visit www. bailey-kirk. com.*please check back after 1:00 p. m. saturday
column23: june 13 to view a video tribute to mr. davis upcoming events. visitationjun 13. 12:00 pm - 1:00 pm bailey-kirk funeral home
